mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_feedback_survey (user_id, q1_ui_clear, q2_search_easy, q3_info_true, q4_contact_valid, q5_pic_desc, q6_found_house, q7_fav_contact, q8_flow_smooth, q9_satisfaction, q10_recommend, q11_bug, suggestion) VALUES (#{userId}, #{q1UiClear}, #{q2SearchEasy}, #{q3InfoTrue}, #{q4ContactValid}, #{q5PicDesc}, #{q6FoundHouse}, #{q7FavContact}, #{q8FlowSmooth}, #{q9Satisfaction}, #{q10Recommend}, #{q11Bug}, #{suggestion})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_feedback_survey ORDER BY create_time DESC
